data.text: @LBasacco @TracyOlson8 @dremilyportermd It's my understanding that n95s have to be fitted to you also.
@22Oldboy @TracyOlson8 @dremilyportermd This is a lvl of sarcasm I'm not familiar with.

@PaulLukasiak @AppletoZucchini @dremilyportermd That's actually not true and even your "experts" are saying it was basically ineffective. Decades of mask studies have all come to the same conclusion and that is it doesn't really do anything. As recently as a study in May of 2020.
@West3man @AppletoZucchini @PaulLukasiak @dremilyportermd This tired trope. Do you ever come up with new evidence of your position that hasn't been derailed 6 months ago?

@DeaqonJamesLV @AppletoZucchini @PaulLukasiak @dremilyportermd Hi there. I'm unsure if you've been informed of this but it appears to have been discovered recently that masks inconclusively do little to prevent spread. SNL even made a dumb skit about it last Saturday. Pretty sure CDC gods put it out as well.

@r_y_a_n__t @ScienceAccount1 @AtomsksSanakan @drbehardisty @UmarEazyE @dremilyportermd They are all stuck in loop of cognitive dissonance. They’ve pretty much got nearly everything wrong at this point because they are trusting  “The Science ™️” instead of engaging in actual scientific process. It’s quite insane, and they are getting quite desperate.

@ScienceAccount1 @AtomsksSanakan @drbehardisty @_cqlj @UmarEazyE @dremilyportermd There is no way @AtomsksSanakan  would claim this, he is too smart to advertise so much ignorance for all his followers to see.
